content.question: After reading the scenario, respond to A, B, and C below. Referencing the scenario, describe the informal power being used by President Reagan and explain how the president’s action reflects the principle of federalism. In the context of the scenario, explain how the bureaucracy could impact the implementation of President Reagan’s order. Describe an action the legislative branch could take to respond to President Reagan’s order. Explain why Democratic control in Congress might make this action more likely against President Reagan’s order.

frqParts.text: After reading the scenario, respond to A, B, and C below. Describe an action the legislative branch could take to respond to President Reagan’s order. Explain why Democratic control in Congress might make this action more likely against President Reagan’s order.

topic.text: 2.2: Structures, Powers, and Functions of Congress

skill.text: Skill 1.D: Describe political principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors illustrated in different scenarios in context.
